bioAsHtml: Jon has been involved in the Scala community for over a decade, having launched the first commercial and open-source Scala software back in 2005. Since then, he has successfully deployed Scala projects into small, medium and large businesses, and UK government, but is best known these days for his work on Rapture, the Scala World conference, and as chair of the Scala Center Advisory Board.
